channel.title: M A S K
channel.description: MASK is a collection of virtual reality wearables that help overcoming difficulties. Here you can find all the resource to create your own MASK and World.

item.title: Doc: Fabrication Overview
item.description:
What I Used

cardboard - ask for used box in wine shop; buy one paper and ask for cardboard protector/holder (Blick)
paperstock - various colors, good for prototype (Blixk)
wax paper
mylar - transparent and durable but less easier to fold (Blixk)
foam - from “Economy Foam & futons”

####Tricks

  • Glue foam with hot glue.
  • Fabric glue and staple for fabric.

item.title: Doc: Tech Overview
item.description:
What I Used

Google Cardboard - put inside MASK
Three.js - platform to build the virtual world
Maya - modeling, rigging, animation
Pepakura - mask paper template generator
Peer.js - WebRTC peer-to-peer data, video, and audio calls
Arduino - physical computing
Eagle - muscle sensor circuit design

AUDIO check beforehand next time!!!

Here are the short lists of feedback, based on my faint memories because I was super nervous during Q&A.

From Critic

They don’t buy MASK as a tool to overcome difficulties Just as mid-term presentation, my original intention seems not echo with others. Am I just enjoying myself?

More user feedback What did user feel after wearing the MASK? Could do more user tests.

Opensource? They feel the masks are too special and my style and only I’ll make the masks.

From Myself

Something to talk/do more next time

  • Interact with people in both world.
  • Once I choose to wear mask, I decide to stay and deal with it, and try to change my mindset.
  • Change all the still screen capture with video

item.title: Doc: THESIS DEFENSE DONE!
item.description:
Thesis internal presentation was done. YAHHHHH. A lot of things to add and also a lot of things to change.

AUDIO check beforehand next time!!! And here are the short lists of feedback, based on my faint memories because I was super nervous during Q&A.

From Critic

They don’t buy MASK as a tool to overcome difficulties Just as mid-term presentation, my original intention seems not echo with others. Am I just enjoying myself?

More user feedback What did user feel after wearing the MASK? Could do more user tests.

Opensource? They feel the masks are too special and my style and only I’ll make the masks.

From Myself

Something to talk/do more next time

  • Interact with people in both world.
  • Once I choose to wear mask, I decide to stay and deal with it, and try to change my mindset.
  • Change all the still screen capture with video
